item.title: How Differential Steering Works
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: The approach of starting with the most basic design and gradually adding features is a great way to demonstrate how this works. That is true of many things.
item.content:encoded: The approach of starting with the most basic design and gradually adding features is a great way to demonstrate how this works. That is true of many things.

item.title: How a Car Works
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: howacarworks.com: A beautiful detailed guide to how cars work with over 280 articles and 2,000 illustrations. They have a section on manuals as well.
item.content:encoded:
howacarworks.com:

A beautiful detailed guide to how cars work with over 280 articles and 2,000 illustrations.

They have a section on manuals as well.

item.title: Car Buying History
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Thinking about the issues with Utah forbidding Tesla from selling cars, I was reminded of another Planet Money episode: Why Buying A Car Is So Awful: Why hasn’t anyone figured out a better way to sell cars? Why can’t you just go to a car store and shop for cars from a bunch of different […]
item.content:encoded:
Thinking about the issues with Utah forbidding Tesla from selling cars, I was reminded of another Planet Money episode: Why Buying A Car Is So Awful:

Why hasn’t anyone figured out a better way to sell cars? Why can’t you just go to a car store and shop for cars from a bunch of different manufacturers? Why don’t cars have real price tags â€” with real prices, that people actually pay?

Today on the show: Why car buying is so unpleasant, and what your local legislators may be doing to keep it that way.

Car dealerships have successfully lobbied for some interesting legal provisions over the years.
